original_title: Looney Tunes Spotlight Collection: The Premiere Edition
overview: 28 of the very best animated shorts starring the very wackiest Warner Bros. cartoon characters. It's an unprecedented animation celebration for cartoon lovers eager to relive the heady, hilarious, golden age of Warner Bros. animation.
tagline: They're the clown princes of animation.
title: Looney Tunes Spotlight Collection: The Premiere Edition
